TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit OpenWriteCompletedEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类的实例传递给方法。Instances of this class are passed to methods. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何打开用于写入要上载的数据的流。The following code example demonstrates opening a stream to write data to be uploaded. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#16](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#16)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#16)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#16)] 可用流时，被调用以下方法。The following method is called when the stream is available. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#15](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#15)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#15)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#15)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Result As Stream
public: property System::IO::Stream ^ Result { System::IO::Stream ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取用于向服务器发送数据的可写流。

span.span: Gets a writable stream that is used to send data to a server.

value.span: 可在其中写入要上载的数据的 。

span.span: A where you can write data to be uploaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应检查和之前使用此属性返回的流的属性。You should check the and properties before using the stream returned by this property. 如果属性的值是对象或属性的值是`true`，未正确完成异步操作和属性的值将无效。If the property's value is an object or the property's value is `true`, the asynchronous operation did not complete correctly and the property's value will not be valid. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用此属性返回的流。The following code example uses the stream returned by this property. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#15](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#15)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#15)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#15)]
